long_description:
Connect Claude to your Shopify Plus store with 128 powerful tools across 24 categories spanning products, orders, customers, inventory, analytics, fulfillment, discounts, metafields, markets, gift cards, and more. Full GraphQL Admin API coverage for enterprise e-commerce automation.

## Features

- **Products & Collections**: Create, update, search, and manage your entire catalog
- **Orders & Fulfillment**: Process orders, create fulfillments, handle refunds
- **Customers & B2B**: Manage customers, companies, and wholesale pricing
- **Inventory**: Track and update inventory across locations
- **Analytics**: Store performance, forecasting, conversion analysis
- **Marketing**: Discounts, campaigns, social media content generation
- **Automation**: Bulk operations, scheduled tasks, recovery campaigns

## Requirements

- Shopify Plus store (or Partner development store)
- Admin API access token with appropriate scopes

access_token.title: Admin API Access Token
access_token.description: Your Shopify Admin API access token. Create one in your Shopify admin under Settings > Apps > Develop apps.
